body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Bryan Allen and the customer's name is Lori Butler.  The conversation is about a random business (a Accounting Firm ) and is a conversation about billing.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Bryan Allen, and I represent Apex Accounting Firm. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Bryan, my name is Lori Butler. I'm having some issues with my recent bill.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Lori. Can you please tell me the amount that is causing concern?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: The bill is for two hundred and fifty dollars but it seems higher than what I expected.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that amount, Lori. For verification purposes, may I have your account number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my account number is one two three four five six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect! And could you please provide me with your date of birth?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for that information, Lori. I will look into your billing issue right away.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome! Thank you for your time, Lori. If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
